title: Spokanistan51
author: Spokanistan51
created_time: April 21, 2023, 10:07:17 PMLast edit: June 30, 2023, 12:01:20 AM by Spokanistan51
content: Up for sale/trade ICG slabbed Satori serial #5329. I was able to purchase this one to add to another 53XX serial I own, putting this one up for sale/trade. 53XX serials are one of the lowest out there by forum collectors, purchased directly from Japan. A few other members have some with sequential 53XX serials. These serials have the red sunburst in the middle of the hologram vs. the orange sunbursts in later serial versions.One member here has unicorn serial #361 purchased directly from Japan, the only lower serial I have witnessed.Happy to use Miner Jones for Escrow as needed. PM me offers.Trades open to other vintage loaded/peeled items BTCC/Cas/Lealana/Moonbits chips/A&G #83 cards, Gold etc.

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.body: A few trade offers, but not enticing enough to let it go. Still for sale/trade.Quote from: 123Dave on May 29, 2023, 09:17:02 PMIs this sold?

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.body: Satori SODL . Congrats to new owner!
